lead_paragraph: In this contemporary reimagining of Marvel's original and longest-running superhero team, "Fantastic Four" joins four young outsiders as they teleport to a dangerous alternate universe, in the process altering their physical form in powerful and surprising ways. With their lives changed forever, the team must master their new abilities and work together to save Earth from a former friend turned formidable foe.
